name: Asteri (Wyattari)
description:
Grab some friends and restart the universe 

Also playable solo. Fullscreen + headphones recommended.

How To Play: Collect stardust and bring it back to your ship.

Only two buttons, works on a keyboard or with gamepads. We had a lot of fun playing online(locally) with Parsec.

Enjoy!

For Ludum Dare 47

  • Programming: Carl Larsson + Dan Colman
  • Art: Wyatt Strain
  • Mucis, SFX, & Vocals: Alex Cap (heyycap)
